Translated by Tripiá¹­aka Master Xuanzang on Imperial Order
Chapter 19, Section 2: Contemplation of Practice, Part One
World-Honored One!

If the perfection of generosity is unborn, then it is not the perfection of generosity. If the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and wisdom are unborn, then they are not the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and wisdom.
Why is this?
The perfection of generosity and non-arising are non-dual and indivisible, and the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and wisdom and non-arising are non-dual and indivisible.
Why is this?

Because non-arising dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-arising of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving, and the non-arising of morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom is not morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom.
World-Honored One!

The non-arising of the four meditations is not the four meditations, and the non-arising of the four immeasurable [minds] and four formless concentrations is not the four immeasurable [minds] and four formless concentrations.
Why is it so?
Because the four meditations and non-arising are neither two nor divided, and the four immeasurable [minds] and four formless concentrations and non-arising are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because non-arising is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the four concentrations that do not arise are not the four concentrations, and the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations that do not arise are not the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations.
World-Honored One!

The eight liberations that do not arise are not the eight liberations, and the eight superior realms, nine sequential concentrations, and ten universal bases that do not arise are not the eight superior realms, nine sequential concentrations, and ten universal bases.
Why is it so?

Because the eight liberations and non-arising are neither two nor divided into two parts, and the eight superior realms, nine sequential concentrations, and ten universal bases and non-arising are neither two nor divided into two parts.
Why is it so?

Because non-arising is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the eight liberations that do not arise are not the eight liberations, and the eight spheres of mastery, nine successive concentrations, and ten universal bases that do not arise are not the eight spheres of mastery, nine successive concentrations, and ten universal bases.
World-Honored One!

The four establishments of mindfulness that do not arise are not the four establishments of mindfulness, and the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, and eightfold noble path that do not arise are not the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path.
Why is it so?
Because the four establishments of mindfulness and non-arising are non-dual and undivided, and the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path and non-arising are non-dual and undivided.
Why is it so?

Because the unborn is neither one nor two nor many nor different, therefore the four establishments of mindfulness that are unborn are not the four establishments of mindfulness, and the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path that are unborn are not the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path.
World-Honored One!
The emptiness liberation gate that is unborn is not the emptiness liberation gate, and the signless, wishless liberation gates that are unborn are not the signless, wishless liberation gates.
Why is it so?
Because the emptiness liberation gate and the unborn are neither two nor divided, and the signless, wishless liberation gates and the unborn are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the unborn is neither one nor two nor many nor different, therefore the emptiness liberation gate that is unborn is not the emptiness liberation gate, and the signless, wishless liberation gates that are unborn are not the signless, wishless liberation gates.
World-Honored One!
The five eyes not arising are not the five eyes, and the six supernormal knowledges not arising are not the six supernormal knowledges.
Why is it so?
The five eyes and non-arising are non-dual and undivided, and the six supernormal knowledges and non-arising are non-dual and undivided.
Why is it so?

Because the Dharma of non-arising is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the five eyes not arising are not the five eyes, and the six supernormal knowledges not arising are not the six supernormal knowledges.
World-Honored One!

The ten powers of a buddha not arising are not the ten powers of a buddha, and the four forms of fearlessness, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha not arising are not the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha.
Why is it so?

The ten powers of a buddha and non-arising are non-dual and undivided, and the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha and non-arising are non-dual and undivided.
Why is it so?

Because non-arising dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-arising of the ten powers of a buddha is not the ten powers of a buddha, and the non-arising of the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha is not the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha.
World-Honored One!

The non-arising of suchness is not suchness, and the non-arising of the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, detached nature, dharma determination, dharma abode, ultimate reality, space realm, and inconceivable realm is not the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm.
Why is it so?
Because suchness and non-arising are neither two nor divided, and the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm and non-arising are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because non-arising dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, true suchness that is non-arising is not true suchness, and the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm that is non-arising is not the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm.
World-Honored One!

Unsurpassed perfect enlightenment that is non-arising is not unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, and all-knowledge, knowledge of the aspects of the path, and knowledge of all aspects that are non-arising are not all-knowledge, knowledge of the aspects of the path, and knowledge of all aspects.
Why is it so?

Because unsurpassed perfect enlightenment and non-arising are neither two nor divided, and all-knowledge, knowledge of the aspects of the path, and knowledge of all aspects and non-arising are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the unborn is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the arising of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment is not unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, and the arising of the cognition of the knowledge of path aspects and the cognition of all aspects is not the cognition of the knowledge of path aspects and the cognition of all aspects.
World-honored One,
the arising of the unforgetting mind is not the unforgetting mind, and the arising of the nature of always being equanimous is not the nature of always being equanimous.
Why is it so?
Because the unforgetting mind and non-arising are neither two nor divided. The nature of always being equanimous and non-arising are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the unborn is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the arising of the unforgetting mind is not the unforgetting mind, and the arising of the nature of always being equanimous is not the nature of always being equanimous.
World-honored One,
all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways are non-arising, then they are not all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways; all samÄdhi gateways are non-arising, then they are not all samÄdhi gateways.
Why is it so?
All dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways and non-arising are non-dual and undivided, all samÄdhi gateways and non-arising are non-dual and undivided.
Why is it so?

Because the Dharma of non-arising is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways are non-arising, then they are not all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways; all samÄdhi gateways are non-arising, then they are not all samÄdhi gateways.
World-Honored One!
Form is non-cessation, then it is not form; feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness are non-cessation, then they are not feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness.
Why is it so?
Form and non-cessation are non-dual and undivided, feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness and non-cessation are non-dual and undivided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-extinguished form is not form, the non-extinguished feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are not feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.
World-Honored One!
The non-extinguished eye sense field is not the eye sense field, the non-extinguished ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are not the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields.
Why is it so?
Because the eye sense field and the non-extinguished are neither two nor divided. The ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields and the non-extinguished are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-extinguished eye sense field is not the eye sense field, the non-extinguished ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are not the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields.
World-Honored One!

The cessation of the sense field of form is not the sense field of form, the cessation of the sense fields of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas is not the sense fields of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas.
Why is it so?
The sense field of form and cessation are non-dual and indivisible, the sense fields of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas and cessation are non-dual and indivisible.
Why is it so?

Because the Dharma of cessation is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the cessation of the sense field of form is not the sense field of form, the cessation of the sense fields of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas is not the sense fields of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas.
World-Honored One!

The cessation of the eye constituent is not the eye constituent, the cessation of the form constituent, eye-consciousness constituent, and eye contact and the factors produced by the condition of eye contact is not the form constituent up to the factors produced by the condition of eye contact.
Why is it so?

The eye element and non-extinction are neither two nor divided, and the form element up to the eye contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinct dharma is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-extinction of the eye element is not the eye element, and the non-extinction of the form element up to the eye contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings is not the form element up to the eye contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings.
World-Honored One!

The ear element and non-extinction are not two and not divided, and the sound element, ear consciousness element, and ear contact, as well as the feelings produced from ear contact as a condition, and non-extinction are not two and not divided.
Why is it so?

The ear element and non-extinction are neither two nor divided, and the sound element up to the ear contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the ear-element, being non-extinguished, is not the ear-element, and the sound-element up to the ear-contact as condition-produced feelings are non-extinguished and are not the sound-element up to the ear-contact as condition-produced feelings.
World-Honored One!

The nose-element, being non-extinguished, is not the nose-element, and the smell-element, nose-consciousness element, and nose-contact as condition-produced feelings are non-extinguished and are not the smell-element up to the nose-contact as condition-produced feelings.
Why is it so?
Because the nose-element and non-extinction are neither two nor divided, and the smell-element up to the nose-contact as condition-produced feelings and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguishing dharma is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the nose sense field that is not extinguished is not the nose sense field, and the smell sense field up to the nose contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings that are not extinguished are not the smell sense field up to the nose contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings.
World-Honored One!

The tongue sense field that is not extinguished is not the tongue sense field, and the taste sense field, tongue consciousness sense field, and the tongue contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings that are not extinguished are not the taste sense field up to the tongue contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings.
Why is it so?

Because the tongue sense field and non-extinction are neither two nor divided, and the taste sense field up to the tongue contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguishing dharma is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the tongue element, which is not extinguished, is not the tongue element, and the taste element up to the tactile objects as a condition for the arising of various feelings, which are not extinguished, are not the tactile objects as a condition for the arising of various feelings.
World-Honored One!

The body element, which is not extinguished, is not the body element, and the tactile objects, body consciousness, body contact, and the tactile objects as a condition for the arising of various feelings, which are not extinguished, are not the tactile objects up to the tactile objects as a condition for the arising of various feelings.
Why is it so?

Because the body element and non-extinguishing are neither two nor divided, and the tactile objects up to the tactile objects as a condition for the arising of various feelings and non-extinguishing are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguishing dharma is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the earth element not extinguishing is not the earth element, and the water element, fire element, wind element, space element, and consciousness element not extinguishing are not the water element, fire element, wind element, space element, and consciousness element.
World-Honored One!

The eye element not extinguishing is not the eye element, and the form element, eye consciousness element, and eye contact and its conditioned states not extinguishing are not the form element, eye consciousness element, and eye contact and its conditioned states.
Why is it so?
Eye element and non-extinguishing are neither two nor divided. Form element, eye consciousness element, and eye contact and its conditioned states, and non-extinguishing are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Thus, the mental faculty being non-extinguished is not the mental faculty, and the dharma realm up to the mental contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings being non-extinguished is not the dharma realm up to the mental contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings.
World-Honored One!

The earth element being non-extinguished is not the earth element, and the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements being non-extinguished are not the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements.
Why is it so?
Because the earth element and non-extinction are neither two nor divided, and the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the earth element being non-extinguished is not the earth element, and the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements being non-extinguished are not the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements.
World-Honored One!

The noble truth of suffering not being extinguished is not the noble truth of suffering, and the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path are not extinguished, so they are not the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path.
Why is this?

The noble truth of suffering and non-extinction are non-dual and indivisible, and the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path and non-extinction are non-dual and indivisible.
Why is this?

Because the Dharma of non-extinction is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the noble truth of suffering not being extinguished is not the noble truth of suffering, and the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path not being extinguished are not the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path.
World-Honored One!

Ignorance not being extinguished is not ignorance, and formations, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress are not extinguished, so they are not formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress.
Why is this?
Ignorance and non-cessation are non-dual and not divided into two parts, and formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress are non-dual and not divided into two parts.
Why is it so?

Because the Dharma of non-cessation is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-cessation of ignorance is not ignorance, and the non-cessation of formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress is not formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress.
World-Honored One!

The non-cessation of internal emptiness is not internal emptiness, and the non-cessation of external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, empty emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, conditioned emptiness, unconditioned emptiness, absolute emptiness, limitless emptiness, dispersed emptiness, unchanging emptiness, inherent emptiness, specific emptiness, common emptiness, all dharmas emptiness, emptiness of non-attainment, nature emptiness, self-nature emptiness, and emptiness of the nature of non-existence is not external emptiness up to the emptiness of the nature of non-existence.
Why is it so?

Inner emptiness and non-extinction are non-dual and not divided into two parts, outer emptiness up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence and non-extinction are non-dual and not divided into two parts.
Why is it so?

Because the Dharma of non-extinction is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-extinction of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness, the non-extinction of outer emptiness up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is not outer emptiness up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.
World-Honored One!

The non-extinction of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving, the non-extinction of precepts, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom is not precepts, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom.
Why is it so?

The perfection of giving and non-extinction are non-dual and not divided into two parts, the perfection of precepts, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom and non-extinction are non-dual and not divided into two parts.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguishing Dharma is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-extinguishing of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving, and the non-extinguishing of morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom is not morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom.
World-Honored One!

The non-extinguishing of the four concentrations is not the four concentrations, and the non-extinguishing of the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations is not the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations.
Why is it so?
Because the four concentrations and non-extinguishing are neither two nor divided, and the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations and non-extinguishing are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the Dharma of non-extinction is neither one nor two, neither many nor different. Therefore, the four formless concentrations that are not extinguished are not the four formless concentrations.
World-Honored One!

The eight liberations that are not extinguished are not the eight liberations, and the eight superior realms, nine sequential concentrations, and ten universal bases that are not extinguished are not the eight superior realms, nine sequential concentrations, and ten universal bases.
Why is it so?

Because the eight liberations and non-extinction are without duality and without distinction, and the eight superior realms, nine sequential concentrations, and ten universal bases and non-extinction are without duality and without distinction.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the eight liberations being non-extinguished are not the eight liberations, and the eight spheres of mastery, nine successive concentrations, and ten universal bases being non-extinguished are not the eight spheres of mastery, nine successive concentrations, and ten universal bases.
World-Honored One!

The four establishments of mindfulness being non-extinguished are not the four establishments of mindfulness, and the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, and eightfold noble path being non-extinguished are not the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path.
Why is it so?

Because the four establishments of mindfulness and non-extinction are neither two nor divided, and the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-extinguished four establishments of mindfulness are not the four establishments of mindfulness, and the non-extinguished four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path are not the four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path.
World-Honored One!
The non-extinguished emptiness liberation gate is not the emptiness liberation gate, and the non-extinguished signless, wishless liberation gates are not the signless, wishless liberation gates.
Why is it so?
Because the emptiness liberation gate and non-extinction are neither two nor divided. The signless, wishless liberation gates and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-extinguished emptiness liberation gate is not the emptiness liberation gate, and the non-extinguished signless, wishless liberation gates are not the signless, wishless liberation gates.
World-Honored One!
The five eyes are not extinguished, and therefore they are not the five eyes. The six supernormal knowledges are not extinguished, and therefore they are not the six supernormal knowledges.
Why is it so?
The five eyes and non-extinction are non-dual and have no divisions. The six supernormal knowledges and non-extinction are non-dual and have no divisions.
Why is it so?

Because the Dharma of non-extinction is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the five eyes are not extinguished, and therefore they are not the five eyes. The six supernormal knowledges are not extinguished, and therefore they are not the six supernormal knowledges.
World-Honored One!

The ten powers of a buddha are not extinguished, and therefore they are not the ten powers of a buddha. The four forms of fearlessness, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha are not extinguished, and therefore they are not the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha.
Why is it so?

The ten powers of a buddha and non-extinction are non-dual and have no divisions. The four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha and non-extinction are non-dual and have no divisions.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the non-extinction of the ten powers of a buddha is not the ten powers of a buddha, and the non-extinction of the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha is not the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha.
World-Honored One!

The non-extinction of suchness is not suchness, and the non-extinction of the dharma realm, dharma nature, true nature, detached nature, dharma determination, dharma abiding, reality limit, space element, and inconceivable element is not the dharma realm up to the inconceivable element.
Why is it so?
Because suchness and non-extinction are neither two nor divided, and the dharma realm up to the inconceivable element and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguishing dharma is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, true suchness that is not extinguished is not true suchness, and the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm that is not extinguished is not the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm.
World-Honored One!

Unsurpassed perfect enlightenment that is not extinguished is not unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, and the cognition of all knowledge, the cognition of the path's characteristics, and the cognition of all characteristics that are not extinguished are not the cognition of all knowledge, the cognition of the path's characteristics, and the cognition of all characteristics.
Why is it so?

Unsurpassed perfect enlightenment and non-extinction are neither two nor divided into two parts, and the cognition of all knowledge, the cognition of the path's characteristics, and the cognition of all characteristics and non-extinction are neither two nor divided into two parts.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, unsurpassed perfect enlightenment that is not extinguished is not unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, and the cognition of the all-knowing, the cognition of the aspects of the path, and the cognition of all aspects that are not extinguished are not the cognition of the all-knowing, the cognition of the aspects of the path, and the cognition of all aspects.
World-Honored One!

The dharma of non-forgetfulness that is not extinguished is not the dharma of non-forgetfulness, and the nature of constant relinquishment that is not extinguished is not the nature of constant relinquishment.
Why is it so?
Because the dharma of non-forgetfulness and non-extinction are neither two nor divided, and the nature of constant relinquishment and non-extinction are neither two nor divided.
Why is it so?

Because the non-extinguished dharmas are neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, the dharma of non-forgetfulness that is not extinguished is not the dharma of non-forgetfulness, and the nature of constant relinquishment that is not extinguished is not the nature of constant relinquishment.
World-Honored One!
all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways are not extinguished, then they are not all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways; all samÄdhi gateways are not extinguished, then they are not all samÄdhi gateways.
Why is this?
all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways and non-extinction are non-dual and undivided, all samÄdhi gateways and non-extinction are non-dual and undivided.
Why is this?

Because the Dharma of non-extinction is neither one, nor two, nor many, nor different. Therefore, all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways are not extinguished, then they are not all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways; all samÄdhi gateways are not extinguished, then they are not all samÄdhi gateways.
World-Honored One!
form is non-dual, then it is not form; feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are non-dual, then they are not feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.
World-Honored One!
The eye sense field, not two, is not the eye sense field. The ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields, not two, are not the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields.
World-Honored One!
The form sense field, not two, is not the form sense field. The sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma sense fields, not two, are not the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma sense fields.
World-Honored One!

The eye element, not two, is not the eye element. The form element, eye consciousness element, and eye contact, as well as the feelings that arise from eye contact as a condition, not two, are not the form element up to the feelings that arise from eye contact as a condition.
World-Honored One!

The ear element, not two, is not the ear element. The sound element, ear consciousness element, and ear contact, as well as the feelings that arise from ear contact as a condition, not two, are not the sound element up to the feelings that arise from ear contact as a condition.
World-Honored One!

The nose realm, not two, is not the nose realm. The smell realm, nose consciousness realm, nose contact, and the various feelings produced from nose contact as a condition, not two, are not the smell realm up to the various feelings produced from nose contact as a condition.
World-Honored One!

The tongue realm, not two, is not the tongue realm. The taste realm, tongue consciousness realm, tongue contact, and the various feelings produced from tongue contact as a condition, not two, are not the taste realm up to the various feelings produced from tongue contact as a condition.
World-Honored One!

The body realm, not two, is not the body realm. The touch realm, body consciousness realm, body contact, and the various feelings produced from body contact as a condition, not two, are not the touch realm up to the various feelings produced from body contact as a condition.
World-Honored One!

The mind realm, not two, is not the mind realm. The dharma realm, mind consciousness realm, mind contact, and the various feelings produced from mind contact as a condition, not two, are not the dharma realm up to the various feelings produced from mind contact as a condition.
World-Honored One!
The earth element, not two, is not the earth element. The water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements, not two, are not the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements.
World-Honored One!

The noble truth of suffering, not two, is not the noble truth of suffering. The noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path, not two, are not the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path.
World-Honored One!

Ignorance, not two, is not ignorance. The formative forces, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and mental anguish, not two, are not the formative forces up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and mental anguish.
World-Honored One!
